short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to share current link to popular social media.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the icon to easily share the current page your are browsing to your favorite social network.

Supports Facebook, Google+, Twitter and LinkedIn.
